body: This entire series was a huge plot twist. I came here to fap, not to feel. The art style was superb but the story was sad af.
Bruh the plot was so good i forgot to fap. Yeah it's obviously his brother on the ending panel happy ending huh way to go author

1. The brother died
2. There was a reflection of someone on her glasses at the last panel, it could be her brother

so did she succeed? hope she did. i forgot to fap tbh. story was so touching.
I'm here to nut and fap but instead i receive wet watery eyes :(
That's like dhoujin version of future diaries

And so, mission Accomplished. What has started with a premise as an incest-rape doujin, evolved into a story lifted straight from Groundhog Day, and with a love that even trancends death.. connects into a time loop that will give Edge of Tomorrow a run for its money. And on the bright side.. i think it was implied, that the very last fuck, undo the death flag. She somehow beats Death in its own game, denying the Final Destination fate of her bro, and now has become *her presumed Husband/close partner*. Will she uses her time medicine for something else entirely? Its up to her and her hubby. What a way to end the tri-chapter story of Time-Queen Sister and her beloved Step-Bro
sad moments
What if it was all a dream?

How could you got hard and at the same time filled with sadness while reading this....
The brother lived at the end, huh? Nice ending. Cute and Uplifting.

When the brother died for the first time it causes kusuha to live and create the drugs just to time leap. It is said that the brother always die between 7/3 - 7/5 which she tried to prevent by fuckin her brother at 7/3 - 7/5 when she time leap . When she was fucking her brother sometime in 7/3 the brother got the time leap power which is what is in the part 1,,, also the brother said that if she rapes kusuha time will leap ,, as he do the time leap he crossed time with kusuha which in the end he died because he didn't do the time leap ,, the reason is because he needs to rape kusuha to time leap ,, but the one he's fucking is the kusuha who loves him which doesn't count as rape ..The part two was just kusuha tryin to make her brother live so let's skip that part ,, In the part three it takes a huge turn because kusuha memories was shown to the brother, which the brother feel bad because kusuha's been time leaping for his sake, which they try to end it and she goes back time.My opinion
